issues.title: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 2.37:1. Recommendation:  change background to #188383.

original_issue.message: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 2.37:1. Recommendation:  change background to #188383.
original_issue.selector: html > body > section:nth-child(3) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(1)

issues.title: This element has insufficient contrast at this conformance level. Expected a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1, but text in this element has a contrast ratio of 3.39:1. Recommendation:  change text colour to #636363.

issues.title: Background and foreground colors do not have a sufficient contrast ratio.
